cve_list.title: HTTP Request Smuggling via mod_proxy
cve_list.description: Some mod_proxy configurations allow request smuggling via crafted HTTP headers.

cve_list.title: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) in mod_proxy
cve_list.description: Vulnerability in core of Apache HTTP Server 2.4.59 and earlier.

cve_list.title: Bypass of access controls via mod_proxy_ajp
cve_list.description: Apache HTTP Server 2.4.53 and earlier may not send X-Forwarded-* headers to the origin server if mod_proxy is configured.

cve_list.title: Buffer overflow in mod_lua
cve_list.description: A carefully crafted request body can cause a buffer overflow in the mod_lua multipart parser.

cve_list.title: Apache HTTP Server vulnerability in mod_proxy
cve_list.description: A vulnerability in Apache HTTP Server 2.4.59 and earlier allows for potential exploitation of mod_proxy configurations.

cve_list.title: mod_proxy_uwsgi response smuggling
cve_list.description: Apache HTTP Server 2.4.55 and earlier may smuggling responses via mod_proxy_uwsgi.

cve_list.title: GHOST - GetHostByName Buffer Overflow
cve_list.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the __nss_hostname_digits_dots function in glibc.

cve_list.title: HTTPoxy - Proxy Header Vulnerability
cve_list.description: PHP through 7.0.8 does not properly handle the HTTP_PROXY variable.

cve_list.title: PHP-FPM Remote Code Execution
cve_list.description: Exploit against PHP-FPM under nginx configurations.

cve_list.title: WordPress Object Injection via PHPMailer
cve_list.description: PHPMailer before 6.1.6 contains an object injection vulnerability.

cve_list.title: WordPress NextGEN Gallery SQL Injection
cve_list.description: SQL injection vulnerability in the NextGEN Gallery plugin.

cve_list.title: Prototype Pollution / XSS in jQuery
cve_list.description: jQuery before 3.5.0 allows XSS in the HTML() method.

cve_list.title: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in jQuery.htmlPrefilter
cve_list.description: jQuery before 3.5.0 allows XSS in the htmlPrefilter method.

cve_list.title: XSS in jQuery UI Dialog
cve_list.description: XSS vulnerability in jQuery UI before 1.12.0.

cve_list.title: XSS in jQuery UI Position
cve_list.description: XSS vulnerability in the position component.

cve_list.title: Memory Corruption in ASN.1 Encoder
cve_list.description: Memory corruption in ASN.1 encoder allows potential code execution.
